name: San Nicolás Main Plaza
description: The central meeting point of the city, surrounded by cafes, shops, and historic buildings.

name: Municipal Museum
description: Features local history exhibits and rotating art collections.

name: Parque Aguiar
description: Large green park ideal for family picnics, sports, and jogging trails.

name: San Nicolás Cathedral
description: A beautiful neo-gothic cathedral and religious landmark of the city.

name: Central Market
description: Bustling market offering fresh produce, meats, and artisanal goods.

name: Regional Stadium
description: Hosts football matches, concerts, and large community events.

name: Historic Bridge
address: Río Paraná Crossing, San Nicolás, Argentina
description: An iconic bridge connecting the city with the countryside, great for photos.

name: Teatro Municipal
description: The main theater featuring plays, concerts, and cultural shows all year round.
